item.title: Hudson River Sightseeing Cruise from Albany
item.description: Cruise the mighty Hudson River aboard the ‘Dutch Apple II’ on this 90-minute Albany, N.Y., sightseeing tour. Listen closely as a Hudson River expert talks about the history of the region and the river, including the evolution of industries. Explore the boat itself, crafted from the popular Hudson River Dayliners of yesteryear, and enjoy the view outside as barges, freighters and tugboats pass by. Bring a camera and/or binoculars to capture the eagles and other wildlife that occupy the region. Snacks and drinks are available for purchase.

image.alt: Hudson River Sightseeing Cruise from Albany

item.title: Private Axe Throwing for 1 Hour
item.description: Try your hand at ax throwing in Albany on this private group adventure. You’ll start by learning how to throw axes with your experienced coach, who will then teach you to score and set up a tournament for your group once you’ve all got the hang of it. A fun activity for kids and adults alike, there are private group sessions available most nights of the week (except Sunday).

item.title: 1 Hour Simulated Archery Experience at Far Shot Albany
item.description: Urban Archery! Whether it's your first time ever, first time in a long time, or your first time this week this is the perfect place to have a couple of drinks, share some laughs, and have a friendly competition with friends and family. Our instructors provide a quick tutorial and tips on effective shooting. 2D and 3D targets will be available. Starting 2024 check out our simulation archery - real bows and arrows with VR-style archery games and accuracy. Small groups may be combined with other archers for added competition and fun!

image.alt: 1 Hour Simulated Archery Experience at Far Shot Albany

item.title: Albany Sunset Live Music Cruise
item.description: Climb aboard the ‘Dutch Apple II’ for a 90 min Sunset Cruise of Albany, along the Hudson River. Passengers are able to sit back and relax and enjoy the views, while listening to live acoustic music. Full bar and food is available with items for purchase. Bring binoculars to spot eagles or just sit back and enjoy the views of the lush nature and historic houses that line the riverbanks.

item.title: Ghosts of Albany Haunted Walking Tour
item.description: It turns out, downtown Albany is full of haunted sites. On this small-group walking tour, explore these sites at night, when the ghosts are more likely to appear. Follow your guide past the State Capital Building, State Supreme Court, mystical Egg Statue, and other sights. Listen to stories about Albany’s group of ghost gangsters, haunted night watchmen, and doomed lovers haunting the area.

image.alt: Ghosts of Albany Haunted Walking Tour

item.title: Private Departure Transfer to Albany Airport (ALB)
item.description: Why stress waiting for unreliable taxis or shuttle services from the airport? Ensure peace of mind with a private transfer to your destination. Just relax and leave the driving to us. Transfer services are available 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Choose from a Luxury Sedan transfer for 3 passengers or a 5 passenger Minivan.

image.alt: Private Departure Transfer to Albany Airport (ALB)

item.title: Self-Guided Bar Hunt: Albany's Abuzz
item.description: While walking tours are helpful for getting oriented, they rely on guides and discourage independent exploration. With this bar-crawl-themed scavenger hunt, explore Albany at your own pace while visiting hidden gems, top landmarks, and some of Albany’s most popular bars. Work with your team (or compete against them) answering trivia questions and solving game-like challenges.

item.title: Albany International Airport (ALB) to Albany - Arrival Private Transfer
item.description: Arrive into Albany International Airport (ALB) stress-free, knowing your private driver and vehicle are waiting for you. Avoid waiting in long taxi or shuttle bus lines, or sharing your vehicle with others outside your group. Know there are no hidden charges, and that if your flight is delayed a bit, your driver will track it and wait. Then ride comfortably to your Albany destination.

image.alt: Albany International Airport (ALB) to Albany - Arrival Private Transfer

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Albany by Wacky Walks
item.description: Walk around your Kingdom of Albany while playing Wacky Walks scavenger hunt! Wacky Walks is an app-based royal scavenger hunt that will allow you to rule in your city! Compete with your group to become the King/Queen amongst your group, while finding items around the city and completing fun challenges. Take a photo of the items you find and the challenges you complete to get points. Try to stay the King or Queen of your group for as long as you can and gain as many points as you can! There's no time limit on Wacky Walks, you can play as long as you'd like, in any area of the city you decide. A remote host will help along the way via chat! Explore Albany with Wacky Walks!

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Albany by Wacky Walks

item.title: Albany to Albany International Airport (ALB) - Departure Private Transfer
item.description: Taking public transportation to the Albany International Airport from Albany can take roughly 45 minutes to an hour. With this private, door-to-door departure transfer, save an estimated 30-45 minutes on the road, and travel comfortably to your destination. Pickup is available 24/7 for 1-8 passengers from anywhere in Albany.

image.alt: Albany to Albany International Airport (ALB) - Departure Private Transfer

item.title: Scavenger Hunt in Albany by Operation City Quest
item.description: Operation City Quest of Albany is a great way to see the city! Use an app to submit photos of items you find around the city and challenges you complete for points. The items and challenges can be completed in any order you prefer! See your score on the app leaderboard to see how you compare. The scavenger hunt includes a remote host to help via chat along the way. Come discover Albany.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt in Albany by Operation City Quest

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Albany by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Walk around Albany while trying to survive the zombie apocalypse with Zombie Scavengers! On an app, you'll be given a list of items to find (in any order you choose) to help you survive a zombie apocalypse. You'll get points for finding these items, as well as completing some zombie themed challenges. Figure out the best game plan to get the most points in order to survive. A remote host will chat with you during the game if you have any questions. Prove you can survive the zombie apocalypse in Albany for bragging rights with all your friends!

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Albany by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Albany by 3Quest Challenge
item.description: While walking tours are helpful for getting oriented, they rely on guides and discourage independent exploration. With this interactive scavenger hunt, explore Albany at your own pace while completing game-like challenges and hunting for particular items along the way. Communicate with a game host via chat during the hunt, and compare scores with other teams across the country when you’re done.

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Albany by 3Quest Challenge

item.title: Private Arrival Transfer from Albany Airport (ALB)
item.description: Why stress waiting for unreliable taxis or shuttle services from the airport? Ensure peace of mind with a private transfer to your destination. Just relax and leave the driving to us. Transfer services are available 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Choose from a Luxury Sedan transfer for 3 passengers or a 5 passenger Minivan.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer from Albany Airport (ALB)

item.title: Albany International Airport (ALB) to Albany - Round-Trip Private Transfer
item.description: Take the hassle out of your Albany vacation or business trip with a pre-booked private return transfer service between Albany International Airport to the Albany address or hotel of your choice. A great way to ensure your trip gets off to the best possible start—and end—this 24/7 round-trip transfer service includes a meet-and-greet service at the airport and return pickup from your accommodation for the date and time of your choosing.

image.alt: Albany International Airport (ALB) to Albany - Round-Trip Private Transfer

item.title: Schenectady Scramble Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

item.title: Albany Airport ALB to Killington/Okemo - Arrival Private Transfer
item.description:
Book your private Arrival transfer from Albany Int Airport (ALB) to Killington/Okemo Mountain Ski Resort.
Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.
Our transfers will provide you with such services: meeting with a name plate, door-to-door delivery, no hidden fees, clean cars and professional drivers, which will make your trip more comfortable and safe. We guarantee the quality of the services provided.

image.alt: Albany Airport ALB to Killington/Okemo - Arrival Private Transfer
